name: a Conversation (Games made by a 15 Year old)

description:
Look .... this pandemic may become pretty much hetic and you might not feel very positive.... just speak to someone... anyone..It just might be the cure you need.Moreover ,this might be the cure they need....

this is an EXTREMLY short choice  based conversation. just click on the choice you would make and enjoy the story......
